Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with 'aws:'. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with 'aws:'. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^(?!aws:)[a-zA-Z0-9 _\.\/=+:\-@]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9 _\.\/=+:\-@]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

UserName.markdownDescription:
The name of the user.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: [a-z][a-z0-9\\-]*  
Update requires: Replacement

AccessString.description: Access permissions string used for this user account.
AccessString.markdownDescription:
Access permissions string used for this user account.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Type.description: Type of authentication strategy for this user.
Type.markdownDescription:
Type of authentication strategy for this user.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: password | iam  
Update requires: No interruption

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Passwords.description: Passwords used for this user account. You can create up to two passwords for each user.
Passwords.markdownDescription:
Passwords used for this user account. You can create up to two passwords for each user.

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this user.

An array of key-value pairs to apply to this user.

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Status.description: Indicates the user status. Can be "active", "modifying" or "deleting".
Status.markdownDescription:
Indicates the user status. Can be "active", "modifying" or "deleting".

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption
